instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-2936: What is 820-2936? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2936</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> It is slow when clean the ME region
threads.message:
This is the second machine that happens when the ME region is cleaned. The ME region version is 7.0.0.1193. When I put the version identifies the mac is Wifi inactive when I put the version 7.04.<SIGNAL>1197_1</SIGNAL>.<SIGNAL>5MB_PRD_RGN</SIGNAL> works, but the mac is SLOW when the MagSafe is DISCONTINUED.


[URL unfurl="true"]https://drive.google.com/file/d/1yvUZeecqaQikOBiCbPLHqxqarJbuHzpp/view?usp=sharing[/URL]

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2936</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> It is slow when clean the ME region
threads.message:
Did you clean ME region correctly, or just swapped with generic region from Internet???
Clean ME region MUST be correctly configured for a particular board!!!
